solution_line_template: We know how many aquariums Lucy can clean in a {hours_per_increment}-hour increment. This week, Lucy will work for {total_hours_worked} / {hours_per_increment} = <<{total_hours_worked}/{hours_per_increment}={number_of_increments}>>{number_of_increments} increments.

Lucy can clean {aquariums_per_increment} aquariums per increment, so she can clean {aquariums_per_increment} x {number_of_increments} = <<{aquariums_per_increment}*{number_of_increments}={total_aquariums_cleaned}>>{total_aquariums_cleaned} aquariums.
